1956.verse: لِيَكْفُرُواْ|So as to deny|113|126|9992$بِمَآ|that which|91|116|43$ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ‌ۚ|We have given them.|161|186|1841$فَتَمَتَّعُواْ‌ۖ|Then enjoy yourselves,|174|199|9993$فَسَوْفَ|soon|85|98|3931$تَعْلَمُونَ|you will know.|113|113|212$

1957.verse: وَيَجْعَلُونَ|And they assign|126|149|9994$لِمَا|to what|72|118|426$لَا|not|42|88|30$يَعْلَمُونَ|they know -|101|147|115$نَصِيبًا|a portion,|84|130|2720$مِّمَّا|of what|71|94|216$رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ‌ۗ|We have provided them.|182|193|40$تَٱللَّهِ|By Allah|72|94|9174$لَتُسْــَٔلُنَّ|surely you will be asked|177|199|9995$عَمَّا|about what|96|118|724$كُنتُمْ|you used (to)|111|122|214$تَفْتَرُونَ|invent.|91|91|8207$

1958.verse: وَيَجْعَلُونَ|And they assign|126|139|9994$لِلَّهِ|to Allah|70|95|6$ٱلْبَنَـٰتِ|daughters.|91|116|9996$سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ‌ۙ|Glory be to Him!|126|151|1080$وَلَهُم|And for them|106|131|71$مَّا|(is) what|80|93|262$يَشْتَهُونَ|they desire.|99|99|9997$

1959.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|97|96$بُشِّرَ|is given good news|146|170|9998$أَحَدُهُم|(to) one of them|131|155|904$بِٱلْأُنثَىٰ|of a female,|99|123|1548$ظَلَّ|turns|55|79|9999$وَجْهُهُۥ|his face|91|103|10000$مُسْوَدًّا|dark|82|181|10001$وَهُوَ|and he|65|263|305$كَظِيمٌ|suppresses grief.|132|231|9220$

1956.verse: So they will deny what We have given them. Then enjoy yourselves, for you are going to know.

1957.verse: And they assign to what they do not know a portion of that which We have provided them. By Allah, you will surely be questioned about what you used to invent.

1958.verse: And they attribute to Allah daughters - exalted is He - and for them is what they desire.

1959.verse: And when one of them is informed of [the birth of] a female, his face becomes dark, and he suppresses grief.

1960.verse: He hides himself from the people because of the ill of which he has been informed. Should he keep it in humiliation or bury it in the ground? Unquestionably, evil is what they decide.

1961.verse: For those who do not believe in the Hereafter is the description of evil; and for Allah is the highest attribute. And He is Exalted in Might, the Wise.

1962.verse: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for their wrongdoing, He would not have left upon the earth any creature, but He defers them for a specified term. And when their term has come, they will not remain behind an hour, nor will they precede [it].

1963.verse: And they attribute to Allah that which they dislike, and their tongues assert the lie that they will have the best [from Him]. Assuredly, they will have the Fire, and they will be [therein] neglected.

1964.verse: By Allah, We did certainly send [messengers] to nations before you, but Satan made their deeds attractive to them. And he is the disbelievers' ally today [as well], and they will have a painful punishment.

1965.verse: And We have not revealed to you the Book, [O Muhammad], except for you to make clear to them that wherein they have differed and as guidance and mercy for a people who believe.
